Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Dodgers hope Freddie Freeman will return to the lineup for Game 3 against the San Diego Padres after suffering a sprained right ankle. Freeman was replaced by Max Muncy in Game 2 and is undergoing treatment. Manager Dave Roberts expressed optimism about his availability for Game 3, noting he would play if able. Freeman's absence is significant as he is a key player with both offensive and defensive contributions
